item.description:
Curious about the club and/or membership? Stay at the club from Fri, Jan 23rd (after 7pm) to Sun, Jan 25th to experience an event filled weekend!

Friday night:
Arrive after 7pm & meet the club members during a welcoming reception and club tour...likely to visit the Red Parka Pub for some live entertainment.

Saturday - Ski any of the various mountains nearby:
Attitash (3 miles away)
Wildcat (25 min drive)
Bretton Wood’s (40 min drive)
Great Glen Trails for Cross-country skiing (Sunday with another Meetup Group)

Saturday evening:
Apre-ski social event (Jello-Bowl) from 4p-7p
Night-social event from 9p-1a
Invitations are $12 each with a guest pass from the Innitous. Carpooling available to social events.

Sunday:
Hit the slopes again among the various mountains in the area for some early tracks or explore the quaint downtown shops of North Conway.

Lodging accommodations:
We have separate male and female bunkrooms, so guests will need to bring up their own bedding and bath towels. We have a full kitchen, but space is limited in the refrigerator and we have lots of essentials already for common use.

Weekend Package Rate of $70
Includes: 2 nights of guest lodge fees $20 per night, both social events $24, and welcome reception.

Payment should be handled upon arrival with the Weekend Host. Additional costs for the weekend activities is not included. Must be 21+ to stay at the club.

Contact Gina for more information and to RSVP…space is limited!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the club by 7pm - the side door to the kitchen along the driveway

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: New Guest Weekend at Innitou Ski Runners & Rider house - Jan 23rd to 25th
